name: part_004
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン100万人記念ライブ ⧸ 3DLIVE】Connected Fantasia【ホロライブ】 [RY_5mn2EY6s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Flare and Marine talk on stage after their performance, deciding to go find Noel together.
Transition screen displaying 'NEXT STAGE IS...' with character silhouettes.
Introduction to the song with fireworks on stage.
MC section where the three discuss the song performance and the selection process.

subtitles.original: 呼ばれたような気がして。
subtitles.english: I felt like I was being called.

subtitles.original: いや、でもどう？船長、楽しかった？
subtitles.english: Anyway, how was it? Captain, did you have fun?

subtitles.original: 楽しかったよ！
subtitles.english: I had fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しいね。このまま2人でライブする？
subtitles.english: It is fun. Should the two of us just keep performing?

subtitles.original: うん、ノエルちゃんがいれば大丈夫。
subtitles.english: Yeah, as long as Noel-chan is here, it's fine.

subtitles.original: つまんねぇ。ノエルちゃん？
subtitles.english: Boring. Noel-chan?

subtitles.original: ノエちゃん！
subtitles.english: Noe-chan!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's sing together!

subtitles.original: 黙れ！
subtitles.english: Shut up!

subtitles.original: イチャイチャするふれあ...
subtitles.english: Flare is being all lovey-dovey...

subtitles.original: 一緒に...もう、もうノエル、無視しに来ました。
subtitles.english: Together... Seriously, Noel has come to ignore us.

subtitles.original: なんだ、じゃあ、ちょっと、これからね、
subtitles.english: Oh, well then, from here on...

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ノエちゃんが拗ねてるかもしれないから、一緒にノエちゃんに会いに行こうか。
subtitles.english: ...since Noe-chan might be sulking, shall we go see her together?

subtitles.original: よし、行くか。
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、手繋いで行こうか。
subtitles.english: Then, let's go holding hands.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: ガチ恋！これも違う！ノエル！ガチ！
subtitles.english: True love! This is also wrong! Noel! Seriously!

subtitles.original: NEXT STAGE IS...
subtitles.english: NEXT STAGE IS...

subtitles.original: Hold me baby, 踊るよ Sunday
subtitles.english: Hold me baby, I'll dance on Sunday

subtitles.original: Touch me baby, 気分は Holiday
subtitles.english: Touch me baby, feeling like a holiday

subtitles.original:
PARTY☆NIGHT
お祭り娘
subtitles.english:
PARTY☆NIGHT
Omatsuri Musume

subtitles.original: Houshou Marine 1 Million Subscribers Anniversary LIVE
subtitles.english: Houshou Marine 1 Million Subscribers Anniversary LIVE

subtitles.original: 嫌なこと全部忘れちゃおう
subtitles.english: Let's forget all the bad things

subtitles.original: 一晩眠って目覚めたらハッピーガール
subtitles.english: Sleep for a night and wake up a happy girl

subtitles.original: 夢の途中で出会う不思議
subtitles.english: A mystery met in the middle of a dream

subtitles.original: 悪夢を食べてるバクたちもグッドフレンド
subtitles.english: Even the tapirs eating nightmares are good friends

subtitles.original: いつもならばお喋りもしない
subtitles.english: Normally we wouldn't even talk

subtitles.original: 窮屈な人も陽気なリズムで変身
subtitles.english: Even stiff people transform with a cheerful rhythm

subtitles.original: Hold me baby, ウキウキレディ ストレスは溜めないで
subtitles.english: Hold me baby, cheerful lady, don't let stress build up

subtitles.original: Touch me baby, キラキラボディ リフレッシュしよう
subtitles.english: Touch me baby, sparkling body, let's refresh

subtitles.original: Hold me baby, 踊るよ Sunday 心にも栄養を
subtitles.english: Hold me baby, I'll dance on Sunday, nourish your heart too

subtitles.original: Touch me baby, 気分は Holiday 星空のメロディ
subtitles.english: Touch me baby, feeling like a holiday, melody of the starry sky

subtitles.original: 疲れすぎて臆病な日には
subtitles.english: On days when you're too tired and cowardly

subtitles.original: まぶた閉じてアクセスしてみて
subtitles.english: Try to close your eyes and access it

subtitles.original: ハバパーティーナイト
subtitles.english: Have a party night

subtitles.original: Hold me baby, ウキウキレディ ストレスは溜めないで
subtitles.english: Hold me baby, cheerful lady, don't let stress build up

subtitles.original: Touch me baby, キラキラボディ リフレッシュしよう
subtitles.english: Touch me baby, sparkling body, let's refresh

subtitles.original: Hold me baby, 踊るよ Sunday 心にも栄養を
subtitles.english: Hold me baby, I'll dance on Sunday, nourish your heart too

subtitles.original: Touch me baby, 気分は Holiday 星空のメロディ
subtitles.english: Touch me baby, feeling like a holiday, melody of the starry sky

subtitles.original: Hold me baby, ウキウキレディ
subtitles.english: Hold me baby, cheerful lady

subtitles.original: Touch me baby, キラキラボディ
subtitles.english: Touch me baby, sparkling body

subtitles.original: Hold me baby, ウキウキレディ
subtitles.english: Hold me baby, cheerful lady

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: やあ、楽しかったねー。
subtitles.english: Ah, that was fun, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 懐かしいねー。
subtitles.english: How nostalgic!

subtitles.original: 懐かしいよね。ちょっと、さっきのフレアから引き続きの
subtitles.english: It is, isn't it? We continued with another nostalgic

subtitles.original: 懐かしいアニメソングでお送りしました。
subtitles.english: anime song following the one with Flare.

subtitles.original: デ・ジ・キャラットのね、パーティー・タイム歌いました！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: We sang Party Time from Di Gi Charat! Thank you!

subtitles.original: パーティー・ナイトな。
subtitles.english: It's Party Night.

subtitles.original: あれ？パーティー...ナイト？
subtitles.english: Wait, Party... Night?

subtitles.original: パーティー・ナイトだ。
subtitles.english: It is Party Night.

subtitles.original: 失礼しました。
subtitles.english: My apologies.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございますー。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: これはね、えっと、フレアとね、元々、最初候補にあって。
subtitles.english: This song was a candidate from the very beginning with Flare.

subtitles.original: そう。
subtitles.english: Right.

subtitles.original: いや、っていうか3人曲だし。お姉さん組だもんね。
subtitles.english: I mean, it's a song for three. And we're the older sister group.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよね。ってなって、ちょっとフレアじゃない、えっとノエルにもぶち込むパート...
subtitles.english: That's right. So we decided to give a part to... not Flare, uh, Noel too...

subtitles.original: 私のこと好きすぎか？
subtitles.english: Do you guys love me too much?

subtitles.original: イエーイ。ぎゅー。
subtitles.english: Yay! Hug!

subtitles.original: 怖い怖い怖い...
subtitles.english: Scary, scary, scary...

subtitles.original: いや、でもなんかノエちゃん、
subtitles.english: But you know, I thought Noe-chan

subtitles.original: てっきりまだ怒ってるのかなーって思ったけど、怒ってなくて良かった。
subtitles.english: might still be angry, so I'm glad she's not.

subtitles.original: 怒ってるよ。
subtitles.english: I am angry.

subtitles.original: そんな間を置いて。
subtitles.english: Don't say it after such a pause.

subtitles.original: 怒ってるよ。
subtitles.english: I'm angry.

subtitles.original: 怒ってんの？
subtitles.english: You are?

subtitles.original: なーんでも、でも！だってフレアがいるからね、不機嫌は誤解だからね、ノエちゃんは。
subtitles.english: Well, but! Since Flare is here, my grumpiness was just a misunderstanding.

subtitles.original: あ、本当？誤解？
subtitles.english: Oh, really? A misunderstanding?

subtitles.original: そう、あれはやらされて...やらされてる。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I was made to... made to do that.
